LanguageData.RF_Gun_ARFifty.label: 아말라이트 AR-50
LanguageData.RF_Gun_ARFifty.description: A heavy and accurate, military-grade bolt-action 소총 chambered for .50 calibre bullets. Its weight and muzzle brake significantly lower recoil. Average firerate, very high damage, accuracy and range.
LanguageData.RF_Gun_HecateII.label: 에카티 II 대물저격총
LanguageData.RF_Gun_HecateII.description: A special application scoped 소총 with a long muzzle break and 목재en stock. Packs and ton both in battle and when carried, greatly slowing any wielders pace. Used to destroy walls. Low fire rate, high range, very high damage and accuracy.
LanguageData.Gun_ATR.label: PTRD-41 소총
LanguageData.Gun_ATR.description: Anti tank 소총, with special armor piercing penetration rounds.
LanguageData.Gun_TAMSR.label: SRS99 AM 저격소총
LanguageData.Gun_TAMSR.description: The 저격소총 시스템 Anti-Materiel, more formally known as the Special Applications 소총, Caliber 14.5 mm, SRS99, is a United Nations Space Command 저격소총.
LanguageData.Gun_M82Gun.label: 배럿 M82A1 SASR
LanguageData.Gun_M82Gun.description: The M82 is a recoil-operated, semi-automatic anti-materiel 소총 developed by the American 배럿 Firearms Manufacturing company. It is used by many units and armies around the world. Despite its designation as an anti-materiel 소총, it is used by some armed forces as an anti-personnel 저격소총. Very high damage, long range and very good accuracy.
